```{R}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library()


scoobydoo <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-07-13/scoobydoo.csv')
```

```{R}
years <- scoobydoo %>%
  select("date_aired", "format", "index") %>%
  as.Date(date_aired)
  
  
separate(date_aired)

sixties <- mutate(year < 1970 & year>1959)
seventies <- mutate(year < 1980 & year>1969)
eighties <- mutate(year < 1990 & year>1979)
nineties <- mutate(year < 2000 & year>1989)
two-thousands <- mutate(year < 2010 & year>1999)
twenty-tens <- mutate(year < 2020 & year>2009)
twenty-twenties <- mutate(year < 2030 & year>2019)

```

```{R}
catchphrases <- scoobydoo %>%
  filter(if_it_wasnt_for, split_up, another_mystery, set_a_trap, jeepers, jinkies, my_glasses, just_about_wrapped_up, zoinks, groovy, scooby_doo_where_are_you, rooby_rooby_roo)

drop_na(catchphrases)
filter(!"FALSE")
filter(!"NULL")

group_by(#column#)
  
rowSums(catchphrases)
  
ggplot(x=#columns, y=rowSums#) + geom_bar()
  

```

```{R}
voices <- scoobydoo %>%
  select(fred_va, daphnie_va, velma_va, shaggy_va, scooby_va)

scooby_function <- function(voices){
  voices <- na.omit(voices)
  
unique_va <- sapply(scoobydoo, function(x) length(unique(x)))

return(unique_va)
  }

```

```{R}
runtimes <- scoobydoo %>%
  select("index","run_time","format") %>%
  na.omit(run_time)

total_time <- runtimes %>%
  group_by(format) %>%
  summarize(run_total = sum(run_time))

```
